MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens, affecting properties in Crossley Road. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:31PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of waiting for specialist generator engineers to arrive on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  7:56PM on 3rd February 2021.
